title: Seems to be a popular one, but what is it?
content:
I have been noticing this one more and more but can't seem to match it.  
Can anyone help me end my frustration?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014235812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_sample_6112.jpg)
author: dsb

comments.content:
Ohh man, I have even used Syntax before too.  
Sometimes I just can't get out of my own way.

Thanks Raph!

now i can go to sleep.
